<xs:element name="enable"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="comments" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="imports" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="variables" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="functions" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="collections" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="indexes" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
